thread.title: Fight over leashing dogs is no walk in the national park PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Fight over leashing dogs is no walk in the national park | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Fight over leashing dogs is no walk in the national park PBS NewsHour
text: The urban, 80,000-acre Golden Gate National Recreation Area is unlike all other national parks: For 14 years, it's been the site of a war over dogs, and whether they can run leash-free in certain areas. Special correspondent Spencer Michels reports.
